    • Method Detail

      • getInputStream

        public java.io.InputStream getInputStream(java.lang.String bitmapUid,
                                 java.lang.Object imageSpecs,
                                 java.lang.String url,
                                 BasisDownloadInstructions.InputStreamDownloadInstructor instructor)
                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: BasisDownloadInstructions.Instructions
        Is invoked just before the stream download corresponding to the bitmap is started, provided its computed URL is not null nor empty.

        This is a good place for fetching from a local cache the input stream related to the bitmap.

        Specified by:
        getInputStream in interface BasisDownloadInstructions.Instructions<BitmapClass extends DownloadContracts.Bitmapable,ViewClass extends DownloadContracts.Viewable>
        instructor - if you want the input stream download to be asynchronous, call CoreBitmapDownloader.InputStreamDownloadInstructor#setAsynchronous() and return null ; once the input stream has been download, invoke CoreBitmapDownloader.InputStreamDownloadInstructor#onDownloaded(InputStream).
        Returns:
        if null and CoreBitmapDownloader.InputStreamDownloadInstructor#setAsynchronous() has not been invoked, the framework will download the input from Internet; otherwise that input stream will be used for populating the view
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • onInputStreamDownloaded

        public java.io.InputStream onInputStreamDownloaded(java.lang.String bitmapUid,
                                          java.lang.Object imageSpecs,
                                          java.lang.String url,
                                          java.io.InputStream inputStream)
        Description copied from interface: BasisDownloadInstructions.Instructions
        Is invoked once the stream related to the image view has been downloaded.

        This is a good place for storing the input stream related to the image.

        Specified by:
        onInputStreamDownloaded in interface BasisDownloadInstructions.Instructions<BitmapClass extends DownloadContracts.Bitmapable,ViewClass extends DownloadContracts.Viewable>
        Returns:
        the provided inputStream or a tweaked version of that stream
        See Also:
        BasisDownloadInstructions.Instructions.downloadInputStream(String, Object, String)
